snippet: FRIEDMAN--Dr. Seymour, a wonderfully talented intelligent and innovative Endodontist and professor died on Tuesday, July 5th at home in Roswell, GA, he was 84 years of age. Seymour was a beloved husband to Naomi for 63 years and a cherished father...
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Dr. Seymour, a wonderfully talented intelligent and innovative Endodontist and professor died on Tuesday, July 5th at home in Roswell, GA, he was 84 years of age. Seymour was a beloved husband to Naomi for 63 years and a cherished father to Lee (Brenda), Eugenia (Thomas), and grandchildren Cory, Hannah, Sarah and Gryffin. He will remain forever in our hearts. 1/3
